examples: The Nazis stripped the Jews of all their assets
he was divested of his rights and his title
They disinvested themselves of their rights

definitions.text: reduce or dispose of; cease to hold (an investment)
examples: the board of trustees divested $20 million in real estate property
There was pressure on the university to disinvest in South Africa
The nurse quickly undressed the accident victim
She divested herself of her outdoor clothes
He disinvested himself of his garments
